verses.verse: And, behold,<WH2009> there came<WH935> a man<WH376> of God<WH430> out of Judah<WH4480> <WH3063> by the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> Bethel:<WH1008> and Jeroboam<WH3379> stood<WH5975> by<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> to burn incense.<WH6999>

And he cried<WH7121> against<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> in the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> O altar,<WH4196> altar,<WH4196> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Behold,<WH2009> a child<WH1121> shall be born<WH3205> unto the house<WH1004> of David,<WH1732> Josiah<WH2977> by name;<WH8034> and upon<WH5921> thee shall he offer<WH2076> <WH853> the priests<WH3548> of the high places<WH1116> that burn incense<WH6999> upon<WH5921> thee, and men's<WH120> bones<WH6106> shall be burnt<WH8313> upon<WH5921> thee.

And he gave<WH5414> a sign<WH4159> the same<WH1931> day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> This<WH2088> is the sign<WH4159> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath spoken;<WH1696> Behold,<WH2009> the altar<WH4196> shall be rent,<WH7167> and the ashes<WH1880> that<WH834> are upon<WH5921> it shall be poured out.<WH8210>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when king<WH4428> Jeroboam<WH3379> heard<WH8085> <WH853> the saying<WH1697> of the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> which<WH834> had cried<WH7121> against<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> in Bethel,<WH1008> that he put forth<WH7971> <WH853> his hand<WH3027> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the altar,<WH4196> saying,<WH559> Lay hold<WH8610> on him. And his hand,<WH3027> which<WH834> he put forth<WH7971> against<WH5921> him, dried up,<WH3001> so that he could<WH3201> not<WH3808> pull it in again<WH7725> to<WH413> him.

The altar<WH4196> also was rent,<WH7167> and the ashes<WH1880> poured out<WH8210> from<WH4480> the altar,<WH4196> according to the sign<WH4159> which<WH834> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> had given<WH5414> by the word<WH1697> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And the king<WH4428> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> Entreat<WH2470> now<WH4994> <WH853> the face<WH6440> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and pray<WH6419> for<WH1157> me, that my hand<WH3027> may be restored me again.<WH7725> <WH413> And the man<WH376> of God<WH430> besought<WH2470> <WH853> the LORD,<WH6440> <WH3068> and the king's<WH4428> hand<WH3027> was restored him again,<WH7725> <WH413> and became<WH1961> as it was before.<WH7223>
And the king<WH4428> said<WH1696> unto<WH413> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> Come<WH935> home<WH1004> with<WH854> me, and refresh<WH5582> thyself, and I will give<WH5414> thee a reward.<WH4991>

And the man<WH376> of God<WH430> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the king,<WH4428> If<WH518> thou wilt give<WH5414> me<WH853> half<WH2677> thine house,<WH1004> I will not<WH3808> go in<WH935> with<WH5973> thee, neither<WH3808> will I eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> in this<WH2088> place: <WH4725>

For <WH3588> so<WH3651> was it charged<WH6680> me by the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> Eat<WH398> no<WH3808> bread,<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water,<WH4325> nor<WH3808> turn again<WH7725> by the same way<WH1870> that<WH834> thou camest.<WH1980>
So he went<WH1980> another<WH312> way,<WH1870> and returned<WH7725> not<WH3808> by the way<WH1870> that<WH834> he came<WH935> to<WH413> Bethel.<WH1008>

Now there dwelt<WH3427> an old<WH259> <WH2205> prophet<WH5030> in Bethel;<WH1008> and his sons<WH1121> came<WH935> and told<WH5608> him<WH853> all<WH3605> the works<WH4639> that<WH834> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> had done<WH6213> that day<WH3117> in Bethel:<WH1008> <WH853> the words<WH1697> which<WH834> he had spoken<WH1696> unto<WH413> the king,<WH4428> them they told<WH5608> also to their father.<WH1>

And their father<WH1> said<WH1696> unto<WH413> them, What<WH335> <WH2088> way<WH1870> went<WH1980> he? For his sons<WH1121> had seen<WH7200> <WH853> what<WH834> way<WH1870> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> went,<WH1980> which<WH834> came<WH935> from Judah.<WH4480> <WH3063>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> Saddle<WH2280> me the ass.<WH2543> So they saddled<WH2280> him the ass:<WH2543> and he rode<WH7392> thereon,<WH5921>

And went<WH1980> after<WH310> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and found<WH4672> him sitting<WH3427> under<WH8478> an oak:<WH424> and he said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Art thou<WH859> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> that<WH834> camest<WH935> from<WH4480> Judah?<WH3063> And he said,<WH559> I<WH589> am.
Then he said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Come<WH1980> home<WH1004> with<WH854> me, and eat<WH398> bread.<WH3899>

And he said,<WH559> I may<WH3201> not<WH3808> return<WH7725> with<WH854> thee, nor go in<WH935> with<WH854> thee: neither<WH3808> will I eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> with<WH854> thee in this<WH2088> place: <WH4725>

For <WH3588> it was said<WH1697> to<WH413> me by the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> Thou shalt eat<WH398> no<WH3808> bread<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> there,<WH8033> nor<WH3808> turn again<WH7725> to go<WH1980> by the way<WH1870> that<WH834> thou camest.<WH1980>

He said<WH559> unto him, I<WH589> am a prophet<WH5030> also<WH1571> as thou art; and an angel<WH4397> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> me by the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> Bring him back<WH7725> with<WH854> thee into<WH413> thine house,<WH1004> that he may eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> and drink<WH8354> water.<WH4325> But he lied<WH3584> unto him.
So he went back<WH7725> with<WH854> him, and did eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> in his house,<WH1004> and drank<WH8354> water.<WH4325>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> as they<WH1992> sat<WH3427> at<WH413> the table,<WH7979> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> the prophet<WH5030> that<WH834> brought him back: <WH7725>

And he cried<WH7121> unto<WH413> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> that<WH834> came<WH935> from<WH4480> Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> Forasmuch<WH3282> <WH3588> as thou hast disobeyed<WH4784> the mouth<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> and hast not<WH3808> kept<WH8104> <WH853> the commandment<WH4687> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> thee,

But camest back,<WH7725> and hast eaten<WH398> bread<WH3899> and drunk<WH8354> water<WH4325> in the place,<WH4725> of the which<WH834> the LORD did say<WH1696> to<WH413> thee, Eat<WH398> no<WH408> bread,<WH3899> and drink<WH8354> no<WH408> water;<WH4325> thy carcass<WH5038> shall not<WH3808> come<WH935> unto<WH413> the sepulcher<WH6913> of thy fathers.<WH1>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> after<WH310> he had eaten<WH398> bread,<WH3899> and after<WH310> he had drunk,<WH8354> that he saddled<WH2280> for him the ass,<WH2543> to wit, for the prophet<WH5030> whom<WH834> he had brought back.<WH7725>

And when he was gone,<WH1980> a lion<WH738> met<WH4672> him by the way,<WH1870> and slew<WH4191> him: and his carcass<WH5038> was<WH1961> cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the ass<WH2543> stood<WH5975> by<WH681> it, the lion<WH738> also stood<WH5975> by<WH681> the carcass.<WH5038>

And, behold,<WH2009> men<WH376> passed by,<WH5674> and saw<WH7200> <WH853> the carcass<WH5038> cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the lion<WH738> standing<WH5975> by<WH681> the carcass:<WH5038> and they came<WH935> and told<WH1696> it in the city<WH5892> where<WH834> the old<WH2205> prophet<WH5030> dwelt.<WH3427>

And when the prophet<WH5030> that<WH834> brought him back<WH7725> from<WH4480> the way<WH1870> heard<WH8085> thereof, he said,<WH559> It<WH1931> is the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> who<WH834> was disobedient<WH4784> unto<WH853> the word<WH6310> of the LORD:<WH3068> therefore the LORD<WH3068> hath delivered<WH5414> him unto the lion,<WH738> which hath torn<WH7665> him, and slain<WH4191> him, according to the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> he spoke<WH1696> unto him.
And he spoke<WH1696> to<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> Saddle<WH2280> me<WH853> the ass.<WH2543> And they saddled<WH2280> him.

And he went<WH1980> and found<WH4672> <WH853> his carcass<WH5038> cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the ass<WH2543> and the lion<WH738> standing<WH5975> by<WH681> the carcass:<WH5038> the lion<WH738> had not<WH3808> eaten<WH398> <WH853> the carcass,<WH5038> nor<WH3808> torn<WH7665> <WH853> the ass.<WH2543>

And the prophet<WH5030> took up<WH5375> <WH853> the carcass<WH5038> of the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and laid<WH5117> it upon<WH413> the ass,<WH2543> and brought it back:<WH7725> and the old<WH2205> prophet<WH5030> came<WH935> to<WH413> the city,<WH5892> to mourn<WH5594> and to bury<WH6912> him.
And he laid<WH5117> <WH853> his carcass<WH5038> in his own grave;<WH6913> and they mourned<WH5594> over<WH5921> him, saying, Alas,<WH1945> my brother!<WH251>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> after<WH310> he had buried<WH6912> him, that he spoke<WH559> to<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> When I am dead,<WH4191> then bury<WH6912> me in the sepulcher<WH6913> wherein<WH834> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> is buried;<WH6912> lay<WH5117> <WH853> my bones<WH6106> beside<WH681> his bones: <WH6106>

For <WH3588> the saying<WH1697> which<WH834> he cried<WH7121> by the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> against<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> in Bethel,<WH1008> and against<WH5921> all<WH3605> the houses<WH1004> of the high places<WH1116> which<WH834> are in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria,<WH8111> shall surely come to pass.<WH1961> <WH1961>

After <WH310> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> Jeroboam<WH3379> returned<WH7725> not<WH3808> from his evil way,<WH4480> <WH1870> <WH7451> but made<WH6213> again<WH7725> of the lowest<WH4480> <WH7098> of the people<WH5971> priests<WH3548> of the high places:<WH1116> whosoever would,<WH2655> he consecrated<WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> him, and he became<WH1961> one of the priests<WH3548> of the high places.<WH1116>

And this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> became<WH1961> sin<WH2403> unto the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam,<WH3379> even to cut it off,<WH3582> and to destroy<WH8045> it from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>
